node.title: The Six Stages of Marriage
node.description: Many people go into marriage thinking that it is the solution to their loneliness and that it will bring about an end to all their personal problems. And then there are those who are married who can't understand why their spouse who seemed so perfect at one time is now the cause of all their unhappiness. This message explains God's purpose for marriage and how to get the most out of marriage as we understand God's plan and cooperate with Him as He seeks to prepare us for heaven. This message also explains when divorce is the solution to marriage problems.
